questions.question: What is the name of the omninous outcropping protruding north from Bunsen Peak?
Bunsen Peak was named for a man who is also affiliated with which success?
options: signing the Yellowstone National Park Protection Act

questions.question: Which of one of these is not a thermal feature?
questions.info: A geyser basin is a geographic area that has a cluster of hydrothermal features that include geysers, mudpots, hot springs and fumaroles.

questions.question: What percentage of the park is in Montana?
questions.info: 96% is in Wyoming, 3% in Montana and 1% in Idaho.
